attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In most homes, lighting accounts for around 10-15% of the electricity bill.  Therefore, using Energy saving bulbs would mean a reduction of around 8-12% in household energy consumprion.

Energy saving light bulbs have a number of advantages over traditional light bulbs, most importantly using 80% less power consumption than traditional light bulbs and having a 10 year life span. 

To encourage more people to use energy saving bulbs, normal bulbs should be taxed in order than they are at least the same price as an energy saving bulb.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=+bulbs
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
